definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Was it because of the Quranic verses read in melodic background?
sentences.chinese: 難道是因爲朗誦可蘭經詩篇時有音樂伴奏嗎？

sentences.english: Quote from Al-Quran, "To seek knowledge, go to China".
That is it's the Qur'an for Islam.
How does the Qur'an distinguish between guerillas and terrorists?
sentences.chinese: 可蘭經如何辨別游擊隊員和恐怖分子？

sentences.english: Administration officials called the idea of burning Qurans "un-American."
sentences.chinese: 政府官員稱焚燒可蘭經的想法是違背美國精神的。

sentences.english: Apparently some people were arrested in1994 for reciting the Qu'ran and I have heard of other incidents.
sentences.chinese: 在1994年時我還聽說有人因爲誦讀可蘭經被逮捕。

sentences.english: SACRED】The Bible and Koran are sacred writings.
sentences.chinese: 聖經和可蘭經都是宗教性著作。

definition: to sell only for a good price (idiom)/to wait for a good offer
to keep up with the latest fashion

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
